title: Criminal Minds Season 1 Streaming : Watch & Stream Online via Hulu & Paramount Plus
body_text:
Criminal Minds Season 1 is an American police procedural drama show created and produced by Jeff Davis. The first act of the show brings forward the FBI’s Behavioral Analysis Unit which comprises multiple agents of varying skill sets. Under the sound guidance of Jason Gideon, the team pursues criminal cases of the most twisted kind in a bid to bring peace to society.
Here’s how you can watch and stream Criminal Minds Season 1 via streaming services such as Hulu and Paramount Plus.
Is Criminal Minds Season 1 available to watch via streaming?
Yes, Criminal Minds Season 1 is available to watch via streaming on Hulu and Paramount Plus.
The opening chapter of the series introduces us to the FBI’s Behavioral Analysis Unit, better known as BAU. The special unit is led by Jason Gideon, who takes his team on all kinds of complicated and distressing cases. The unit, which also features Dr. Spencer Reid and Special Agent Derek Morgan, regularly embarks on varying high-stakes missions that see them deal with hardened criminals, including serial killers, kidnappers, and bombers.
The crime drama packs a stellar roster of actors, with Mandy Patinkin and Matthew Gray Gubler leading the line as Jason and Spencer, respectively. The additional cast also includes Shemar Moore, Kirsten Vangsness, Lola Glaudini, Thomas Gibson, A.J. Cook, and Meredith Monroe, among others.
Watch Criminal Minds Season 1 streaming via Hulu
Criminal Minds Season 1 is available to watch on Hulu. The American subscription streaming service offers a variety of content. Alongside beloved TV shows and movies like Modern Family and Game Night, Hulu is also home to hit animated titles like Futurama, Family Guy, and more.
Watch Criminal Minds Season 1 streaming via Paramount Plus
Criminal Minds Season 1 is available to watch on Paramount Plus. The American streaming platform contains the complete oeuvre of CBS, Paramount Pictures, and other Viacom-owned networks. Paramount’s in-house streaming service is also home to popular titles like Frasier, Twin Peaks, FBI, and more.
The synopsis of Criminal Minds Season 1 is as follows:
“An elite team of FBI profilers analyzes the country’s most twisted criminal minds, anticipating their next moves before they strike again. The Behavioral Analysis Unit’s most experienced agent is David Rossi, a founding member of the BAU who returns to help the team solve new cases.”
NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
